prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Bass, Brass, Guitar, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Bass, Brass, and Guitar, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Bass, Brass, and Guitar, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Drums, Bass, Brass, and Guitar, Reed excluded.
